I am crawling with Heritrix 1.14.4, which is installed in a local drive. Wh=
en I use the default settings, everything went well. However, I found that =
the local drive is not big enough so I mounted an external drive in NFS typ=
e and change the "heritrix.jobsdir" to a directory in the NFS mounted drive=
. This causes a problem as the crawler does not crawl. In "state.job" file,=
 it reports that 

"A fatal InitializationException occured when loading jo=
b:
On crawl: crawltest Unable to setup bdb environment."

I read some posts=
 before and kind of get an impression that this error may be caused by usin=
g an NFS mounted drive. But how to get around it? Please help.
